title: KnightRealms Team Recruitment

embed.description: League of Legends is a fast-paced, competitive online game that blends the speed and intensity of an RTS with RPG elements. Two teams of powerful champions, each with a unique design and playstyle, battle head-to-head across multiple battlefields and game modes.

body:
KnightRealms is a sponsored gaming website/community that are looking for a Diamond 1 + team to join us. We are expecting all members to be at least Diamond 1 and take this very seriously. KnightRealms will supply you with RP to get a name change to get the "KR" tag and will also be entering the chosen team into tournaments. 

This is the perfect opportunity to be seen as part of the pro OCE scene and be given benefits from sponsors as well! 

For all enquiries add KR Mynx in-game

replies.body:
Cheers Mynx, 

For any and all enquiries feel free to contact KnightRealms on Twitter [@KR_eSports](https://twitter.com/KR_eSports) or my Personal twitter [@KR_Bodyarts](https://twitter.com/KR_Bodyarts) our [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/knighrealm) or contact myself on [Skype/Teamspeak](http://knightrealms.esportsify.com/articles/features/general/107/contact-us)

KR Bodyart
CEO/Founder
KnightRealms
Could i be given a shot?

I would like to tryout LegendAzz
Although i am not the highest rank i would like to show you my skill and determination that every team needs.
